title: One third of surveyed US games industry workers were laid off in the last two years, GDC reports
full_text: One third of surveyed US games industry workers were laid off in the last two years, GDC reports. A report from GDC has shed a rather sobering light on the state of things, revealing that one third of surveyed US workers within the industry were laid off in the last two years. Read more.
